CustomField.formula: IF( ((BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-dup-TD")) ||(BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-TD"))) , "Test Drive", IF( ((BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-dup-TS")) ||(BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-TS"))) , "Free Trail", IF( ((BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-dup-LM")) ||(BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-LM"))) , "Learn More", IF( ((BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-dup-DM")) ||(BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-DM"))) , "Demo Video", IF( ((BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-dup-IN")) ||(BEGINS( TEXT(LeadSource) , "SFDC-IN"))) , "Installation", TEXT(LeadSource))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Reason
